snippet: The police arrested the pastor after they were notified by the auction house that the works he was trying to sell by the British artist Damien Hirst were forgeries.
abstract: Florida pastor Kevin Sutherland is arrested in New York on grand larceny charge after Sotheby's auction house notifies police that works he was trying to sell by British artist Damien Hirst were forgeries.
lead_paragraph: The police arrested the pastor after they were notified by the auction house that the works he was trying to sell by the British artist Damien Hirst were forgeries.

headline.seo: Rejected by Sotheby’s, Florida Pastor Is Arrested in Sale of Forged Art
headline.main: Rejected by Sotheby’s, Florida Pastor Is Arrested in New York Over Sale of Counterfeit Art
headline.print_headline: Rejected by Sotheby’s, Florida Pastor Is Arrested in New York Over Sale of Counterfeit Art
